comment:
Extracted Variables:
- \( x_{bus} \): Number of bus trips
- \( x_{car} \): Number of car trips

Definitions:
- \( x_{bus} \): Integer variable representing the number of bus trips to transport the monkeys
- \( x_{car} \): Integer variable representing the number of car trips to transport the monkeys

Constraints:
1. \( x_{bus} \leq 10 \): Limit on the number of bus trips
2. \( 0.6(x_{bus} + x_{car}) \geq x_{car} \): At least 60% of the trips should be by car
3. \( 20x_{bus} + 6x_{car} \geq 300 \): Total number of monkeys to transport

Objective:
Minimize \( 30x_{bus} + 15x_{car} \): Total time required to transport the monkeys
